name: Job Quest
description:
Click here to play the game in your browser. Unfortunately, I was unable to make it work as a browser game on itch.io because of its custom format.

My goal was to re-create the stress and frustration that I felt when starting to work full-time. It'll only take you about five or ten minutes. There are a few endings (you'll reach a "Game Over" or end screen). The game was built in Twine with a custom styesheet from Glorious Trainwrecks.

More information on the game can be found on my blog.
